metadata.title: W3Schools.com

metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Git is a popular version control system.
content.html: Git is a popular version control system.

content.text: It was created by Linus Torvalds in 2005, and has been maintained by Junio Hamano since then.
content.html: It was created by Linus Torvalds in 2005, and has been maintained by Junio Hamano since then.

content.text: Note: Most Git actions (like staging, committing, and viewing history) happen on your own computer.
content.html: Note: Most Git actions (like staging, committing, and viewing history) happen on your own computer.

content.text: Only Push and Pull interact with remote servers like GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket to upload or download changes.
content.html: Only Push and Pull interact with remote servers like GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket to upload or download changes.
